data.title: Atlantic Ocean
data.description: Find five pictures of fish that swim in the Atlantic Ocean. Write about what kind of food the fish eats.
data.subject: Science

data.title: Oxygen in the Ocean
data.description: How can fish breath in the water but we can't? Write one paragraph about gills.
data.subject: Science

data.title: The Red Sea
data.description: Coral, is it a plant or an animal? Do some research online, prepare a 5 minute talk.
data.subject: Science

data.title: Salt Water
data.description: Find out what percent of water on Earth is salt water and what percent is fresh water.
data.subject: Science

data.title: The Arctic Ocean
data.description: Find five mammals that live in the arctic ocean. Which is your favorite and why?
data.subject: Science

data.title: Great Behavior
data.description: Paulo was the best student in class this week, his behavior was very good and he did very good in his assignments.

data.title: Got in a fight with Jim
data.description: During lunch time Paulo and Jim got in a fight about the football match.

data.title: 100% in spelling test.
data.description: Paulo came top of the class. He got 20 out of 20 in this weeks spelling test.

data.title: Talking too much
data.description: Paulo was talking a lot in drawing class today. He didn't finish his class assignment.

data.title: Helped the new student
data.description: Paulo made friends with the new boy in class. He invited the new boy to play football together.
